title.en: Tsuihousareru Tabi ni Skill wo Te ni Ireta Ore ga, 100 no Isekai de 2-shuume Musou

altTitles.ja: 追放されるたびにスキルを手に入れた俺が、100の異世界で2周目無双

altTitles.en: I Got a New Skill Every Time I Was Exiled, and After 100 Different Worlds, I Was Unmatched
Unmatched in 100 Different Worlds — I Gain a New Skill Every Time I Get Banished

description.en:
An adventurer named Ed was exiled from his party because he was considered useless, but instead of being sad and upset he was actually happy!!?

It turns out that it's not without reason that he feels happy when he's exiled from his party, because every time he's been exiled he will receive a skill that makes him even more invincible...
- - -
Ed was given the crazy test of having to get expelled from 100 Hero parties in 100 different worlds before he could return to his original world. Finally a mysterious and divine entity said that he had achieved all the conditions to return to his original world.

However, as a final condition he is asked “Look at the fate of one of these exile worlds after you left.” and he is shocked by what he sees.

“Okay, I’ll do it! I’ll go down to these 100 worlds again and be banished with a good feeling!” Ed takes on a new challenge to make full use of the super-powerful “Exiled Skills” that were granted each time he was exiled, and this time ensure they all have happy endings.

Only this time he is accompanied to these 100 worlds by a former companion…
description.id:
Seorang petualang bernama ed di keluarkan dari party nya karena di anggap tidak berguna, namun daripada sedih dan kesal dia malah bahagia!!?.

Ternyata bukan tanpa alasan dia merasa baagia ketika di keluarkan dari party nya di karenakan setiap kali dia di keluarkan dia akan menerima sebuah skill yang membuatnya jadi semakin tidak terkalahkan...

altTitles.th: ยอดคนเลเวลทะลุ

description.en:
Dungeons and monsters suddenly appear and the world falls into chaos. Kim Ki-Bong, an ordinary young part-timer, has been sucked up into an awakening dimension for 3000 years to train his powers.

When he makes his return to reality, he is a max-leveled player who only has one wish - to reconcile with his loved ones. 10 years have passed in the real world during his absence.

How will Ki-Bong be able to find his place in the world with his new limit-breaking abilities?

---
- [Official Traditional Chinese Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/zh-hant/action/full-level/list?title_no=2447)

- [Official Simplified Chinese Translation](https://www.dongmanmanhua.cn/BOY/juexingzhanshi/list?title_no=1571)

- [Official Thai Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/th/fantasy/beyonod-max-level/list?title_no=2547)
description.fr:
Kibong était coincé dans le « test de l’éveil » pendant 3000 ans à cause d’un bug. Enfin libéré du test, le joueur découvre que seulement 10 ans se sont écoulés dans la réalité, et que le monde est devenu un enfer total envahi par les monstres. Avec toutes ses capacités au niveau max, Kibong parviendra-t-il à sauver l’humanité de ces affreuses créatures ?

---

Terjebak dalam ruang simulasi selama 3.000 tahun karena error yang tidak diketahui. Tapi di dunia nyata, hanya 10 tahun sudah berlalu dan kini monster beserta dungeon muncul di dunia ini. Pertarungan Kibong yang kembali dengan MAX LEVEL dimulai untuk mengembalikan semuanya!

알 수 없는 오류로 3000년간 각성 테스트에 갇힌 김기봉.
그 사이 현실에선 10년이 흘렀고, 온 세상은 몬스터와 던전으로 가득차게 되었다.
만렙으로 귀환한 김기봉의 모든 것을 원래대로 돌려놓기 위한 싸움이 시작된다!

description.ru:
Ким Ки Бон, молодой парень, оказался в ловушке из-за неизвестных ему обстоятельств. И только через три тысячи лет, он смог "пробудиться". Но в реальности прошло лишь 10 лет, и за это время, весь мир был наводнён разными и ужасными монстрами..
И с этого момента, пробудившийся Ким Ки Бон вступает в битву, чтобы найти ответы на все свои вопросы.

ในระหว่างที่คิมกิบงถูกขังใน "พื้นที่สำหรับปลุกพลัง" เป็นเวลา 3,000 ปีเนื่องจากเกิดข้อผิดพลาดที่ไม่รู้สาเหตุ เวลาในโลกจริงก็ผ่านไปแล้ว 10 ปี เมื่อคิมกิบงออกมาได้โลกก็กลายเป็นนรกที่มีมอนสเตอร์และดันเจี้ยนเต็มไปหมด การต่อสู้ของคิมกิบงเพื่อฟื้นฟูให้โลกกลับสู่สภาพเดิมเริ่มต้นแล้ว!

description.zh:
菜鸟三千年升级变最强王者！
怪物肆虐的世界由我来拯救！
林纪锋因游戏Bug被困在觉醒空间3000年，并且被怪兽杀死后还可以无限复活！被迫成为游戏玩家的他，为了重新开始自己的生活，必须与怪兽战斗！但他在觉醒空间的这段时间，地球已过去了10年，整个世界都充满了怪兽...

《CHANGE》作家的新作！金起峰因不明異常被困在覺醒試煉裡3000年，在那期間現實已經過了10年，化為怪物肆虐的末日世界。 滿等重生的金起峰，為了讓一切回歸正常而戰。

description.en:
The world is under threat from interdimensional monsters, and only the chosen Awakened - humans possessed of special powers - can defeat them!

Sure, it sounds exciting, but it’s a far cry from reality for ordinary office worker Park Dohyeok, who’s more worried about landing a big business deal that could save his job. That is, until one day when Dohyeok’s path crosses a monster outbreak, causing him to manifest his true powers as a rare and powerful form of Awakened!

With his newfound abilities attracting eager allies and powerful enemies, will Dohyeok find that he has what it takes to survive?
description.it: Il mondo è minacciato da mostri interdimensionali e solo i prescelti "Risvegliati" - esseri umani dotati di poteri speciali - possono sconfiggerli! Certo, sembra eccitante, ma è molto lontano dalla realtà per il normale impiegato Dohyeok Park, che è più preoccupato di concludere un grosso affare che potrebbe salvargli il posto di lavoro. Questo fino a quando, un giorno, la strada di Dohyeok si incrocia con un'epidemia di mostri che gli fa manifestare i suoi veri poteri come una rara e potente forma di Risvegliato. Con le sue nuove capacità che attirano alleati desiderosi e potenti nemici, Dohyeok scoprirà di avere ciò che serve per sopravvivere?
description.ja:
平凡なサラリーマンとして日々を送っていた白虎到（はくと いたる）。 絶体絶命の危機に晒された瞬間、あれほど望んでいた覚醒者に！ しかも、２０代全てをゲームに注いだあの時の記憶と経験が覚醒の能力になるとは！！！ さらに、なんと10億分の1の確率と言われている「トリプル覚醒者」に！ 世界の頂点（トップ）を目指す呪文使い「白虎到」の奇想天外の活躍ストーリーが今、始まります。

---
- [Original Webtoon <Webtoon kakao>](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EB%82%98-%ED%99%80%EB%A1%9C-%EC%A3%BC%EB%AC%B8-%EC%82%AC%EC%9A%A9%EC%9E%90/2436)
---
- [Official Japanese Translation](https://piccoma.com/web/product/74467)
description.ko:
평범한 샐러리맨으로 살아가는 박도혁,
절체절명의 위기에 빠진 순간 그토록 원하던 각성자가 되었다!
그것도 20대 인생을 바친 게임의 기억과 경험이 내 각성 능력이 되다니!!!

더구나, 10억분의 1인 확률이라는
“무려 트리플 각성자! "

세계 최고의 정점을 노리는
주문 사용자 박도혁의 기상천외한 활약기가 지금 바로 시작됩니다.

****************
청초작가님의 인기 웹소설 본격 웹툰화

---
- [Original Webtoon <Webtoon kakao>](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EB%82%98-%ED%99%80%EB%A1%9C-%EC%A3%BC%EB%AC%B8-%EC%82%AC%EC%9A%A9%EC%9E%90/2436)
---
- [Official Japanese Translation](https://piccoma.com/web/product/74467)
description.ru:
"Было бы здорово, если бы я смог использовать все эти способности в жизни!"
Я думал, что исполнить это желание не под силу даже Богу, но в момент смертельной опасности, похоже он услышал меня.
Самое время сыграть в реальность!
Да, теперь я единственный, кто использует заклинания!

---
- [Original Webtoon <Webtoon kakao>](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EB%82%98-%ED%99%80%EB%A1%9C-%EC%A3%BC%EB%AC%B8-%EC%82%AC%EC%9A%A9%EC%9E%90/2436)
---
- [Official Japanese Translation](https://piccoma.com/web/product/74467)

description.en:
At Grace Field House, life couldn't be better for the orphans! Though they have no parents, together with the other kids and a kind "Mama" who cares for them, they form one big, happy family. No child is ever overlooked, especially since they are all adopted by the age of 12. Their daily lives involve rigorous tests, but afterwards, they are allowed to play outside.   
  
There is only one rule they must obey: do not leave the orphanage. But one day, two top-scoring orphans, Emma and Norman, venture past the gate and unearth the horrifying reality behind their entire existence: they are all livestock, and their orphanage is a farm to cultivate food for a mysterious race of demons. With only a few months left to pull off an escape plan, the children must somehow change their predetermined fate.  

---
Official Release:
- Indonesian release by Elex Media as **The Promised Neverland** (2019)
description.pt:
Na “Casa de Grace Field” habitam 38 crianças órfãs.
Vivem felizes com a sua cuidadora, Isabella, a quem as crianças tratam como mãe. Mas certo dia, Emma e Norman descobrem que a Casa de Grace Field é afinal uma “quinta” cujo objetivo é criar alimento para monstros.
As remessas de crianças enviadas são escolhidas pela sua inteligência e desempenho em testes, que servem para tornar os seus cérebros… mais saborosos!
Não querendo perder mais nenhum membro da sua família, Norman e Emma começam a reunir informação vital para a sua sobrevivência e planeiam a sua fuga do orfanato.
description.ru:
Эмма и её друзья вели вполне счастливую сиротскую жизнь в приюте. Да, там жёсткие правила, но зато смотритель добрый. Вот только почему детям запрещено приближаться к воротам и забору?.. Иногда не известно, стоит ли узнавать правду, которая полностью переворачивает всю твою жизнь.  
  
- Won the 63rd Shogakukan Manga Awards in 2018 in the best shounen category.
  


---

**Links:]**   
- [Demizu's Twitter](https://twitter.com/DemizuPosuka)   
- [Anime Season 1 on ANN](https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/encyclopedia/anime.php?id=21552)  
- [Anime Season 2 on ANN](https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/encyclopedia/anime.php?id=23263)
description.pt-br: Emma, Norman e Ray são as crianças mais brilhantes do orfanato Grace Field House. E, sob os cuidados da mulher a que se referem como “mamãe”, todas as crianças tiveram uma vida confortável. Boa comida, roupas limpas e o ambiente perfeito para aprender - o que mais um órfão poderia querer? Um dia, porém, Emma e Norman descobrem a verdade sombria do mundo exterior que eles estão proibidos de ver.

altTitles.es: Ogenki Clinic, La Clínica del Amor

description.en:
The plotline revolves around the quirky (and perpetually horny) Doctor Sawaru Ogenki and his beautiful nurse, the busty Ruko Tatase, who help patients through their problems, and the cure almost always involves sex. The patients suffer from bizarre sexual problems and our doctor and nurse are more than willing to cure them from their problem.

**Note:** The release from Studio Ironcat (Ex-Licenses) is **read** from **left to right**.

A world full of zombies. But this apocalypse... is it worth trying?! [Skills can be 'transferred' from experts.] Mental care, wooden construction, heavenly magic, animal communication, mechanical engineering, performance, etc.. There is so much to learn! The sprint of the prepared survivor, who is good at everything, begins!

---

- [Official Simplified Chinese Translation](https://www.dongmanmanhua.cn/BOY/wannenglieren/list?title_no=1966)
description.ko:
좀비들로 뒤덮여버린 세상. 그런데 이 아포칼립스... 해볼만 하겠는데?!
[전문가에게서 스킬을 '전수'받을 수 있습니다.]
멘탈케어, 목조건축, 천마신공, 동물교감, 기계공학, 연주 등등.. 배울 게 너무 많아서 문제다! 뭐든 다 잘하는, 준비된 생존자의 질주가 시작된다!

---

- [Official Simplified Chinese Translation](https://www.dongmanmanhua.cn/BOY/wannenglieren/list?title_no=1966)
description.ru:
Мир, полный зомби. Но этот апокалипсис... стоит ли пробовать ?!
[Навыки могут быть «переданы» от экспертов.]
Психологическая помощь, деревянное строительство, небесная магия, общение с животными, машиностроение, производительность и т.д. Есть так много всего, чему можно научиться! Начинается гонка подготовленного выжившего, который хорош во всем!

---

- [Official Simplified Chinese Translation](https://www.dongmanmanhua.cn/BOY/wannenglieren/list?title_no=1966)
description.zh:
《觉醒战士》作者新作来袭
梦境变现，恐怖丧尸围城！
每晚做的噩梦竟然成真？！突如其来的丧尸危机，但是这场灾难…感觉还有希望！男主载林在慌乱之中意外获得“传授”技能,开始从各路专家们的身上获取技能。万事已备，无所不能的丧尸猎人开始踏上惊险的生存旅程！

---

- [Official Simplified Chinese Translation](https://www.dongmanmanhua.cn/BOY/wannenglieren/list?title_no=1966)

title.en: Screw the Noble Life, I’m Going Home

altTitles.en: Noble Lady or Whatever, I'm Going Home

description.en:
After confirming that I had won the lottery, I tried to quit my job! However, as soon as I opened the door, I found myself transmigrated into the body of a noble lady. I have one year to claim the prize money, so I have to return home at all costs. Please wait for me, my 1.7 million won! Mum will be there soon, but... What's wrong with this family?!

"I love you." But I'm not your daughter!

"Sister, you might get hurt so I'll hold you." Did he mean he would lift me? What is this guy, a giant brown bear?

"If you mess with our sister one more time, I'll make you disappear without a trace." He's got a pretty face, but he has a sharp tongue.

"Don't fall ill." Don't worry about me. Why are there so many of them?! I'm not a noble lady! Leave me alone, I wanna go home!

Millions of years have passed since the times of legends, when the worlds of man and gods were still the same. In these times it was the desires of man that moved the world. It is the era of the 500 year war: The warring states period. Kingdom is the story of a young boy named Shin who grew into a great general and all the trials and bloodshed that lead him there.  

---
  
- **Won the Osamu Tezuka Cultural Grand Prize in 2013**
- **Earned a Guinness World Record on December 12, 2012 for Manga written by the most people. -Note- The record was due to its "Social Kingdom" campaign in which fans and other artists were given the task of redrawing the entire 26th volume.**

As of June 2022, Kingdom has over 90 million copies in circulation, making it one of the currently best-selling manga series of all time. 

Parution: Weekly Young Jump

---

**Officially Translated:**  
- In French by [Meian](https://www.meian-editions.fr/meian/licence/kingdom/1131)  
- In Italian by [J-pop](https://j-pop.it/it/fumetti/manga/kingdom.html)
description.fr:
**Cette Histoire se déroule avant notre ère.**

La chine, qui n'est pas encore unifiée, traverse une grande guerre de cinq siècles. Shin, un jeune garçon contemporain de ces temps violents et houleux, cherche, par la seule force de son épée, à se faire un nom sous les cieux !!!
___
**Kingdom en France, le manga tant attendu ! Véritable phénomène au Japon !**
- Élu meilleur manga au 17e Grand Prix Culturel Osamu Tezuka (2013)
- Meilleur manga seinen vendu au Japon depuis 2015 (source : Oricon)
- 3ème meilleur manga vendu au Japon en 2016 et 2017 (source : Oricon)
description.pt-br: Milhões de anos se passaram desde os tempos de lendas, quando os mundos dos homens e deuses ainda eram os mesmos. Nestes tempos eram os desejos do homem que mudaram o mundo. É o período da guerra de 500 anos: a Era dos Reinos Combatentes. Kingdom é a história de um garoto órfão e pobre tem o sonho de se tornar um grande general e assim começando seu caminho de provações e derramamento de sangue que o levarão até o topo das lendas!

description.en: Official 4-koma published with the game Link! Life! Love Live!

It's the start of a new school year. The new homeroom teacher for Abikura-kun, a second-year high school boy, is Hiyori Hiwamura, who is known as a "Scary Teacher", rumored to curse you if she gets offended!One day after school, Abikura-kun witnessed the other side of "YowaYowa-sensei"... and he is shocked by the gap between reputation and reality! The opening of a romantic comedy that will stir up your protective instincts!!
description.ja: 新学期。2年生に進級した男子高校生・阿比倉くん達のクラス担任になったのは、機嫌を損ねれば呪われると噂の通称『こわこわ先生』こと、鶸村ひより先生だった！ そんな、『こわこわ先生』の裏の一面を、ある日の放課後、目撃してしまった阿比倉くんは……。まさかのギャップに悶絶必至！ あなたの庇護欲を掻き立てる、よわよわラブコメ開幕!!

description.en: Aizawa Haruki, 16 years old, is in his 2nd year of high school, and likes to live efficiently. One day during summer vacation, a girl, Aizawa Himari, suddenly appears, calling him 'Onii-chan' and claiming that she's his little sister. As it turns out, Haruki's father recently remarried, and his new wife brought a daughter with her. However, since both of their parents are overseas, it'll only be the two of them living under the same roof. And for some reason, Himari seems very obstinate about spending as much time with Haruki as she can.

One of Zhenhua's trilogies, this love is unforgettable, yet no one knows it. Because of a single, lasting encounter when she was younger, Luo Zhi has had a crush on Sheng Huainan for eleven years. His appearance was so radiant, and since then, Luo Zhi's diary has become a one-sided love story that belongs to her alone. Because of Sheng Huainan, Luo Zhi followed him all the way and was admitted to his university. Because of multiple encounters, Luo Zhi and Sheng Huainan finally approached each other...

altTitles.ja: みつばものがたり 呪いの少女と死の輪舞《ロンド》

altTitles.ja-ro: Mitsuba no Monogatari - Noroi no Shoujo to Shi no Rondo

description.en:
This world is turning for me...

While sleeping in a "deathly" boring dark world, Mitsuba woke up from a long sleep with a mysterious all-powerful feeling, the girl was destined to die, but the magic that was poured into her for 10 years brought the power of a "curse" that should not exist in this world.
Her stepmother, fearing Mitsuba's "death," takes away her aristocratic nature and enrolls her in a military academy. However, this was only the beginning of Mitsuba's use of the "curse" to pursue her own path.

The powerful "curse" that resides in a small girl causes a unique tale of otherworldly devastation!

altTitles.en: Secretly, Secretly; But Unable to Hide It

description.en: That year, someone secretly wormed their way into Sang Zhi's heart and she fell in love with her brother's friend Duan Jiaxu. That older brother has beautiful peachy eyes and casually calls her a "kid". That spark of surprise when they first met made Sang Zhi want to slowly get closer to him, but the 7-year age difference felt like an insurmountable gap that she couldn't cross over. Not knowing when it started, the crush buried at the bottom of her heart sprouted, and slowly, it spread into his heart too...
description.zh: 那年，桑稚的心里偷偷地住进了一个人，喜欢上哥哥的朋友段嘉许，这个大哥哥有着好看的桃花眼，漫不经心的喊她“小孩”，初见的惊艳总是让桑稚忍不住想要靠近，但是7岁的年龄差仿佛又是他们无法逾越的鸿沟，不知从何时起，埋藏在心底的青涩暗恋逐渐发芽，慢慢地，也蔓延进了他的心里...【

title.en: Jojoni Deremi ga Mashiteku Tsundere Gyaru

altTitles.ja: 徐々にデレ味が増してくツンデレギャル

altTitles.vi: Cô nàng gal tsundere ngày càng đáng yêu hơn

altTitles.ja-ro: Jojoni Deremi ga Mashiteku Tsundere Gal
Jojoni Deremi ga Mashiteku Tsundere Gyaru

altTitles.tr: Tsundere Gal Günden Güne Daha Sevimli Hale Geliyor

altTitles.en: The Tsundere Gal Whose Dere Side Gradually Increases

title.en: My Wife Is From a Thousand Years Ago

altTitles.zh: 我家老婆来自一千年前

altTitles.zh-ro: Wojia Laopo Laizi Yiqian Nian Qian
Wǒjiā Lǎopó Láizì Yīqiān Nián Qián

altTitles.vi: Vợ Tôi Từ Một Ngàn Năm Trước
Bà Xã Nhà Tôi Đến Từ Ngàn Năm Trước

altTitles.fr: Ma femme vient d'il y a 1000 ans

description.en: Jiang He, a girl from the Tang Dynasty, traveled through a thousand years and appeared in front of Xu Qing. Fate brought together this love that spanned a thousand years. Everything the girl was familiar with has become history. Relatives, friends, and enemies have all been left behind 1,200 years ago. The boy is unreserved and leads the girl to start a new life. Pain, confusion, cheers, and laughter will remain in this new world.

title.en: Maronie Oukoku no Shichinin no Kishi

altTitles.ja-ro: Marronnier Oukoku no Shichinin no Kishi

altTitles.en: The Seven Knights of the Marronnier Kingdom

altTitles.ja: マロニエ王国の七人の騎士

description.en: The Marronnier Kingdom lies landlocked by seven other nations. General Baribara sends her seven children, from the sleepless Nemukunai to the eternally hungry Harapeko, out to these kingdoms in the interests of diplomacy.  Yet Baribara herself is not from Marronnier, and questions swirl internally and externally about her power and those of her children; and it seems there may be more going on in the other kingdoms linked to her family than is first apparent.  Winner of "Kono Manga ga Sugoi!" in 2018 in the female category (the second year in the row for manga-ka Nao Iwamoto), this josei fantasy series is full of humour, romance, and mystery.

altTitles.pt-br: A Bruxa gênia perdeu seu MP

altTitles.vi: Nàng Phù Thủy Thiên Tài Hết Mana Rồi!

description.en: Nayu, the one in a million genius witch who has been the talk of the town, has run out of magic! The price for all the things she has been allowed to do because of her brilliance is coming back to the former genius witch like a boomerang... Then, she meets her past student "Komugi" who loves her very much. This is a boomerang love comedy of karmic retribution by a former genius witch who can't be left alone even though it stings a little, abandoned by her magical powers!
description.pt-br: Nayu, aquela em um milhão de bruxas geniais que tem sido o assunto da cidade, ficou sem magia! O preço por todas as coisas que ela foi autorizada a fazer por causa de seu brilhantismo está voltando para a ex-bruxa genial como um bumerangue... Então, ela lembrou de seu ex-aluno "Komugi", que a ama muito. Esta é uma comédia de amor de retribuição cármica por uma ex-bruxa genial que não pode ser deixada sozinha, mesmo que doa um pouco, abandonada por seus poderes mágicos!

description.en:
From Newtype site:  
  
Our ages are different, our ways of life are different, everything is different. But… I just want to be with you!  
Because I've never been in a miserable, tragic romance, I can say that unrequited love is fine…  
I don't know why I fell in love with this person…it's a mystery!  
  
They have different personalities, different ages, different ways of thinking, different looks, different everything.  
This is the story of girls who clumsily make up for what's lacking in the other.  
  
T/N:  
These are side stories. Not a rewrite of the original serialized twitter comic. It builds up on what happens in the main series in a longer format. It eventually merges with the main series in the volume edition.
   
The kind of stories these are is all in the title!  
  
不揃 (fuzoroi) means uneven, irregular, but also incomplete. 連理 (renri) is "entwined relationship".  

So, these are stories of intimate relationships between "incomplete" girls that somehow complete each other, against all odds.

Tanaka Iori is a worker for a company that sets unreasonable demands, on top of that she has a penchant for dating married men. What a recipe for disaster! One day she gets drunk with an acquaintance and wakes up the next morning by her side naked! What's Iori to do?  
  
- [Part 1 raw](https://twitter.com/i/moments/1030773596430327808)
- [Part 2 raw](https://twitter.com/i/moments/1044057437831979008)
- [Part 3 raw](https://twitter.com/i/moments/1065586182698889216)

title.en: Moto Ansatsusha, Tensei Shite Kizoku no Reijou ni Narimashita

altTitles.ja: 元暗殺者、転生して貴族の令嬢になりました

altTitles.en: A Former Assassin Was Reborn as a Blue-Blooded Daughter

description.en:
The story is about Serena, a former assassin who was reincarnated as a duke's daughter after failing her mission. She initially thought that pretending to be a noble would be easy, but she struggled with the gap in perception between herself and her mother, who had a flighty personality, and her adoptive sister, who deceived those around her in an attempt to push Serena out of the picture.

Despite skillfully dodging the harassment she faced at the tea parties full of rivalry and navigating the complex social life of a school embroiled in love and hate, Serena's cold demeanor resulted in her being ostracized and isolated. One day, she discovers that her adoptive sister is engaged to the second prince, which leads her to run away from home. However, it is at this point that the first prince, Evan, appears in front of her...

Follow Serena, a former assassin who knows nothing of love, as she charges forward into the aristocratic society of another world in this comedic, occasionally romantic tale.
description.ja:
任務に失敗した暗殺者が転生したのは、公爵令嬢のセレナ。「私は元暗殺者。なりすますなんて簡単だ」そう思っていたセレナだが、 頭がお花畑な母親や、彼女を蹴落とそうと周りを欺く義妹などとの感覚のズレに日々いら立ち、生きづらさを感じていた。 
マウントだらけのお茶会に、愛憎ドロドロな学園生活……周囲からの嫌がらせを冷めた目で痛烈にかわしながらも、その冷徹さゆえに疎まれ孤立していくセレナ。 そしてある日、義妹が第二王子と婚約することを知り、ついに家出を決意する。しかしそこに第一王子のエヴァンが現れて--!?
愛を知らない元暗殺者が貴族社会を突き進む、異世界転生コメディときどきラブ!？

description.en: Yan Shuangshuang watched her former lover die before her eyes. An angel appeared, giving her a chance to live again. However, after her rebirth, everything went wrong.

title.en: I Can Use the Card Drawing System to Summon Beautiful Girls

altTitles.zh: 我能用抽卡系统召唤美少女

altTitles.zh-ro: Wo Neng Yong Chou Ka Xitong Zhaohuan Mei Shaonv

description.en: “It’s a disaster! I’ve been taken over by a mysterious card-drawing system and found myself surrounded by adorable girls in a mobile game! What’s even more terrifying is that among them is the antagonist sister sent by the Demon King from another world to hunt me down. What should I do? Seeking urgent advice online!”

title.en: My Clumsy and Erotic Neighbor Sayuri-san

altTitles.ja: 不器用でエロい隣人さゆりさん

altTitles.es-la: Mi torpe y erótica vecina Sayuri-san

description.en: Series Follows Our Main Character and His Interactions With His Neighbor Sayuri-san.
description.ja: 高校生の主人公が、隣人の主婦である「さゆりさん」と様々なエロティックなシチュエーションを繰り広げるというストーリー。

title.en: I Am the Descendant of the Divine Dragon!

description.en: In the highly competitive world of the Xuan Realm Continent, where warriors strive to refine their bodies, cultivate their martial abilities, harness the essence of the heavens and earth, and push beyond mortal limitations, our protagonist, Lu Hao, faces unjust persecution from his own clan since childhood. However, fate smiles upon him as he awakens the dormant bloodline of the Divine Dragon within him. With an unyielding resolve, Lu Hao embarks on an extraordinary journey, overcoming countless obstacles to ascend to the zenith of power. Along the way, he unravels the enigmatic secrets of his past life.

title.en: This Life Starts as a Child Actor

altTitles.en: Acting the Child Role at the Start of This Life
Beginning as the Child Actor in This Life
I'm Going to Be the Child Actor in This Life
This Life Starts as Child Actor
This Life Starts From a Child Role

description.en:
Was this life a failure? On the contrary, I like it! Kang Su-hyun, who has failed in everything he has done in life for four years. He finally found his calling as an actor and thought he was seeing the light, but he collided with a truck coming from the opposite side and despaired as death approached...

“Wait a minute, didn’t I die?”

When he regained consciousness, was his appearance reflected in the mirror the cutest version of himself from when he was 5 years old? Yes, in this life I start as a child actor!

Kang Su-hyun's acting career begins.

title.en: Revenge of the Iron-Blooded Sword Hound

altTitles.en: Revenge of the Sword Clan's Hound

altTitles.pt-br: A vingança do cão de caça de sangue de ferro Baskerville

description.en:
Raised to kill like a pack of loyal hounds, the Baskerville children took countless lives as a band of fearsome assassins.

Despite being the shunned illegitimate son of the brood, Vikir served his family faithfully, only to meet his untimely demise at his father’s hands. But when he is inexplicably reborn with a second chance at life, Vikir, armed with the memories and knowledge of his past, swears to rise above the pack and take his revenge.

This time, he's ready to bite the hand that feeds.

title.en: The Outcast Is Too Good at Martial Arts

altTitles.en: The Bullied One Is Too Good at Fighting

altTitles.es-la: El acosado es demasiado bueno luchando

description.en:
Martial artist Cha Moo-yeol falls for President Chang's manipulations and becomes a vegetable while competing in mixed martial arts. He is then used by the chairman as part of Jang's makeover. When he finally dies, he is possessed by the body of a high school student of the same name.
A hard body with S-class durability. A status bar ability that allows him to improve his martial arts skills, but this time it's different.
With his unfulfilled dream of becoming the strongest, he begins the fight for revenge against the president.
description.es-la:
El artista marcial Cha Moo-yeol cae en las manipulaciones del presidente Chang y se convierte en un vegetal mientras compite en artes marciales mixtas. Luego es utilizado por el presidente como parte de un cambio de imagen de Jang. Cuando finalmente muere, es poseído por el cuerpo de un estudiante de instituto del mismo nombre.
Un cuerpo duro con durabilidad de clase S. Una habilidad de barra de estado que le permite mejorar sus habilidades en artes marciales, pero esta vez es diferente.
Con su sueño incumplido de convertirse en el más fuerte, comienza la lucha por la venganza contra el presidente.

description.en: “Look and you’ll die.” “Post a message and you’ll be cursed.” Horror begins to spread with the use of smartphones. Introducing a new series filled with mystery about the horrors of social media!
description.es-la: "Mira y morirás". “Publica un mensaje y serás maldecido”. El horror comienza a extenderse con el uso de los teléfonos inteligentes. ¡Presentamos una nueva serie llena de misterio sobre los horrores de las redes sociales!

description.en:
On the day he was rejected by the company he had devoted his life to,
He went back to the moment of his first day at work. Kim Cheol-su, a low-spec rookie employee who joined Han-young, a leading domestic company. Can he finally achieve his long-desired position as the ‘CEO’ in this lifetime?

Once upon a time, a Demon King named Rchimedes caused havoc and destruction in the Human World. He was sealed away by the great hero Creasion, and peace returned to the world.  
  
1000 years later, Rchimedes has returned, a hole has opened up in the Human World, and countless monsters have sprung up. To prevent any further destruction, the King calls upon all 75 (probable) descendants of Creasion.  
  
This story focuses on the adventures of descendant number 45, Alba, and the royal soldier appointed to assist him, Ross.  
  
[Senyuu Season 1](http://seiga.nicovideo.jp/comic/senyu)    
[Senyuu Season 2](http://seiga.nicovideo.jp/comic/senyu2)  
[Senyuu Season 3](http://seiga.nicovideo.jp/comic/senyu3)  
[Senyuu Season 4](http://seiga.nicovideo.jp/comic/senyu4)  
[Senyuu+](http://seiga.nicovideo.jp/comic/senyuplus)  
[Senyuu F5 Reload](http://seiga.nicovideo.jp/comic/39515)

altTitles.es-la: GUERRA EN EL JARDIN DE INFANTES

description.en:
Welcome to Kindergarten Noir, an exclusive school catering to children of the global elite!

Rita, one of the teachers, has been on the hunt for a boyfriend but has had absolutely zero luck so far. One day, an assassin comes after one of the children... and he’s totally dreamy?!

Dive into this action-packed rom-com as it unfolds inside the world’s "safest" kindergarten!
description.tr: Bu anaokulunda dünyanın en önemli isimlerinin çocukları eğitim görmektedir; politikacılar, şirket başkanları, petrol kralları, aklınıza ne gelirse! Efsanevi eski suikastçı Rita, özgürlük karşılığında anaokulundaki çocukları suikastlardan korumak için gizli bir göreve atanır!? Dünyanın "en güvenli" anaokulu hakkında bir Aksiyon/Komedi hikayesi!
description.es-la: RESUMEN RAPIDO: encargados de una jardín infantil, son asesinos profesionales y los cuidan con el fin de reducir sus condenas, si logran protegerlos en X tiempo, podrán ser libre pero ¿lo lograran?

description.en: A genius boy who had everything taken away in the name of the law. Dagon, the demon who murdered his father, has become the chairman of a global automobile company comparable to Tesla... and what was taken away by law is regained by law! Hae-seong Yoon becomes a lawyer and begins to gather suspicious people. Can a law firm with only two employees take down Yang Dagon, the tycoon who controls Korea?

He had gone through tens, hundreds of reincarnations. From being the Ultimate Martial Emperor to conquering everything under the heavens, he had accomplished it all. All he wanted now was to finally rest, but the darn cycle of reincarnation just wouldn't end!
In his latest reincarnation, he found himself as 'Seok Jin-ho', the youngest son of the Seok family – the most prominent merchant clan in the Central Plains.
Born into a wealthy family, he thought about leading a simple and carefree life, but the will remaining in his body conveys a final wish.
It crave to prove itself!
"Very well, I will fulfill your wish. But in my own way!"

I, Hayato, once met an Oni princess when I was young, and I made a promise to marry her when I became eighteen. But after that day, I was predisposed to experiencing ecchi disasters whenever I touch women. With the cause unknown, I intended to live out my life in high school without ever finding a girlfriend. But on that fateful day, Sakura, the Oni princess grown up, came back as promised.  
  
This is the tale of an Oni Princess x High School Boy and the mystery of the ecchi Curse Charm that circles them.

altTitles.ja: モンスターシュタイン

description.en:
A few decades back, humanity went to war against strange beings such as werewolves and witches, and was on the verge of defeat.

The solution to breaking this deadlock was the human weapon created by Dr. Frankenstein. Time passes, and Vic, a mysterious girl, is traveling with Stein, a large man covered in scars.

All in order to destroy the distorted principles of this world.
description.ja: 十数年前、人狼や魔女など異形の存在との戦争に挑んだ人類は敗北の危機を迎える。その局面を打開したのはフランケンシュタイン博士が生み出した人間兵器――。時は流れ、謎多き少女ヴィクは、傷だらけの大男シュタインと旅をしていた。すべてはこの世界の歪んだ理を破壊するために。

title.en: Kurasu no Gyaru ni Kuuki Atsukai Sareteimasu

altTitles.ja-ro: Kurasu no Gyaru ni Kuuki Atsukai Sareteimasu

altTitles.ja: クラスのギャルに空気扱いされています

altTitles.id: Aku Dianggap Seolah-olah Tidak Ada Oleh Gadis Gyaru Di Kelas

altTitles.en: The Gals in My Class Treat Me Like Air

description.en:
Yuhyeon becomes the youngest CEO of Hansung, a successful electronics company built on toxic work culture, but nobody he cares about is there to celebrate with him. After a night of drinking and wondering if he could change the past, he wakes up the next morning, 20 years younger at the beginning of his career.Armed with the experience and insights that made him CEO, Yuhyeon begins to revisit broken relationships and battle the enablers of Hansung’s cut-throat work environment. But he does not yet know how changing the past will affect his future...  (Source: Webtoons)

---
**Original Webtoon:** [Naver](https://comic.naver.com/webtoon/list.nhn?titleId=751168)

---
**Official Translations:** [English](https://www.webtoons.com/en/drama/a-mans-man/list?title_no=2876), [Chinese (Simplified Characters) / 汉语](https://dongmanmanhua.cn/METROPOLIS/nanzihan/list?title_no=1548), [Chinese (Traditional Characters) / 漢語](https://www.webtoons.com/zh-hant/city-office/a-mans-man/list?title_no=3278),  [Indonesian / Bahasa](https://www.webtoons.com/id/drama/the-man/list?title_no=2257), [Japanese / 日本語](https://manga.line.me/product/periodic?id=Z0001100)
description.ru: Хан Ю Хён, лучший офисный работник на небесах и на земле. Потеряв все, он вернулся в прошлое и изменил свою жизнь!

description.en:
It is the year 20XX. Earth has been assaulted by monsters known as 'the Enemy of Humanity'. In order to deal with this threat, special schools comprised of teenagers with extraordinary abilities were formed. These people, who came to be known as 'the Talented', have abilities that defy the rules of reality. Among these superpowered individuals was an outlier, someone who was sent to one of these schools despite having no innate special abilities whatsoever. This is the story of our protagonist, who attempts to defeat the Enemies of Humanity through the use of intelligence and manipulation.  

---

**Officially Translated:**  
- In French by [Doki-Doki](https://www.doki-doki.fr/manga-talentless-volume-1-9782818945223.html)
description.ms: Pada tahun 20XX, Bumi telah diserang oleh raksasa yang dikenali sebagai "musuh umat manusia". Dalam untuk menandingi ancaman dari mereka, satu sekolah khas telah dibentukkan bagi mengumpul golongan budak dengan kebolehan istimewa. Mereka dikenali sebagai orang yang "berbakat" dengan kebolehan melawan hukum realiti. Di kalangan orang dengan kuasa luar biasa ini, ada seseorang telah dihantar ke sekolah ini dengan tanpa ada kebolehan istimewa atau apa-apa pun. Ini adalah cerita di mana protagonis, yang cuba melawan musuh umat manusia dengan cara cerdik dan manupulasi sendiri.
description.ru: 50 лет назад на Землю явились "враги человечества". Чтобы противостоять им, были собраны дети со сверхспособностями и отправлены в школу на одиноком острове далеко в море. Один из них, Накадзима Нанао, упорно продолжает скрывать свою способность, из-за чего его прозвали "бездарем". Тем временем в класс Нанао переводятся двое учеников — Онодэра Кёя и Хираги Нана. Кёя, как и Нанао, скрывает свою способность, а Нана заявляет, что умеет читать мысли людей. Какие изменения принесут двое переведённых учеников этой школе?

altTitles.en: Studio Apartment, Good Lighting, Angel Included.

altTitles.ja: ワンルーム、日当たり普通、天使つき。

altTitles.zh: 單間, 光照尚好, 附帶天使

description.en:
What will happen when you wake up, and find a cute girl lying next to you in bed? Furthermore, she is not an ordinary girl, but an Angel who comes from Heaven???

Shintarou Tokamitsu is a high school boy living alone. One day, he found a beautiful girl sitting on his balcony. Her name is Towa, but what is her true identity? A romantic comedy between two innocent souls.
description.ja: 人暮らしの男子高校生、徳光森太郎。彼が自宅のベランダで出会ったのは清楚で優しい女の子『とわ』。けれど彼女の正体は…？　無垢な二人の胸キュン同居ラブコメディ♪
description.vi: Chúng ta đã quen với câu chuyện về anh nhân viên nhặt được bé JK tại lề đường. Nhưng sẽ ra sao nếu vẫn với chủ đề nhặt được người ấy, cậu học sinh năm nhất cao trung lại nhặt được một thiên thần từ Thiên Đàng ngay trong căn hộ của cậu ta? Chuyện gì sẽ xảy ra tiếp theo??

title.en: The Ghost and the Exhausted Office Worker

description.en:
A story about an old ghost and the exhausted office worker he watches over as he gradually learns to find meaning in his life.

Original by [@yukiyuki_nkym](https://twitter.com/yukiyuki_nkym) on Twitter.

Cheon Sunwoo, a timid, fearful student, gains the ability to see the future.
If one cannot avoid fate, then stand against that fate.

---
**Links:**
- Alternative Official Raw - [Naver Series](https://series.naver.com/comic/detail.series?productNo=10442873)
description.ko:
겁 많은 학생 천선우에게
 미래를 보는 능력이 생긴다
 운명을 피할 수 없다면
 그 운명에 맞서라

description.en:
Baili Jin, a fairy who was living in heaven, eating and drinking without a care, broke her Majesty’s colourful, stained-glass plate at her birthday and got banished to the mortal realm. Now she has to begin her adventures in the mortal realm with all of her spiritual powers gone! In order to survive, the former fairy has to deliver take-out….  
  
An endearingly silly fairy, a gentle restaurant manager, a reserved top student and a hard to resist yandere onee-san (kind on the outside, dark/possessive on the inside) , let the story of their beautiful friendship and youthful days begin!  
  
Author's weibo: [@Viva喂娃酱](https://weibo.com/vivaandjulys)   
Artist's weibo: [@Julys橘奶司](https://weibo.com/julys0723)

title.en: Touhou Ibara Kasen ~ Wild and Horned Hermit.

altTitles.en: Eastern Thorned Poet Hermit ~ Wild and Horned Hermit.

altTitles.ru: Тохо Ибаракасэн ~ Дикий и Рогатый Отшельник

altTitles.ja: 東方茨歌仙　～ Wild and Horned Hermit.

altTitles.de: Der Rosenpoet des Ostens ~ Wild and Horned Hermit.

altTitles.uk: Тохо Ібаракасен ~ Дика та Рогата Відлюдниця

description.en:
In this 10 volume official Touhou series, spanning the time period of nine long years between the UFO and WBaWC games, we follow the misadventures of the business inept shrine maiden Reimu Hakurei and her ever-curious friend Marisa Kirisame, who meet a mysterious, young hermit woman named Ibara Kasen.  
  
Upon seeing how sloppily the Hakurei Shrine conducts its business, she decides to become a regular shrine visitor, determined to lend her near unlimited wisdom to the shrine maiden, in order to make her place a proper Shinto Shrine. Does the nagging, yet well meaning hermit bring nothing but good-will with her advice, or is there something more sinister hiding behind the friendly face and her bandaged arm?
description.pt:
De Zun, Wild and Horned Hermit é o último mangá da série Touhou, seguindo os passos de Silent Sinner in Blue, Inaba the Moon & Inaba the Earth e a triologia Sangetsusei.  
Desta vez, Marisa encontra uma misteriosa eremita fora da aldeia humana, No entanto, ela contou para Reimu sobre essa mulher, sendo vista ao redor do Santuário, ela é Ibara Kasen, uma estranha asceta com um braço enfaixado por causa de uma certa habilidade desconhecida da natureza, cujo mantem uma disciplina mais consciente do que elas e de qualquer um em Gensokyo.

title.en: Tensei Kizoku no Isekai Boukenroku ~Jichou wo Shiranai Kamigami no Shito~

altTitles.en: Adventure Record of Reincarnated Aristocrat ~ The apostle of Gods Who Doesn’t Know Self-Restraint~
Wonderful adventure in Another world! "God... That's going too far!!" he said...

altTitles.ja: 転生貴族の異世界冒険録 ～自重を知らない神々の使徒～

altTitles.en: Chronicles of an Aristocrat Reborn in Another World

altTitles.ja-ro: Tensei Kizoku no Isekai Bōken-roku ~ Jichō o Shiranai Kamigami no Shito ~

altTitles.th: เกิดใหม่เป็นขุนนางไปผจญภัยในต่างโลก ~อัครฑูตจอมซุ่มซ่ามของทวยเทพ~

altTitles.zh: 转生贵族的异世界冒险录

altTitles.zh-hk: 轉生貴族的異世界冒險錄

altTitles.en: The Aristocrat’s Otherworldly Adventure: Serving Gods Who Go Too Far

description.en:
Shiina Kazuya, the protagonist of the story was killed by a stranger in front of a convenience store when he tried to protect two young girls escaping from the stranger who is trying to stab them. The girls fall and are too overcome with fear to get up and continue running away. When Shiina Kazuya awakens he realizes that he was reincarnated as the young noble Cain von Silford, the third son of an aristocrat (Margrave Garm Von Silford) and his second wife (Sarah) in a world filled with sword and sorcery.

Prior to the age of ten Cain grew up in the Gracia Territory surrounded by gods that don't know self-restraint, in the upper echelon of nobility, and a loving family (father Garm Von Silford, mother Sarah, and older sister Raine). At the age of ten Cain is given peerage (Title of Duke, own estate, and an engagement), which leads to him living in Esfort the Royal Capitol.

This is a classic isekai fantasy about an overpowered young man who just wants to be an average adventurer. He has received the maximum level of divine blessings from all seven gods, overcomes any obstacle that comes his way while hiding his unbelievable status and tends to build a harem of highly influential nobles.

altTitles.th: สามรั่วตัวแสบ

description.en: The somewhat precocious and sadistic girl Mitsuba, the somewhat lecherous muscle girl Futaba, and the somewhat mysterious gloomy girl Hitoha. Better known as the (mischievous) "Marui Sisters," this is the story of how these triplets go about their days in Class 6-3 with their cute yet wild antics.

title.en: The Moon on a Rainy Night

altTitles.pt-br: A Lua em uma Noite Chuvosa

altTitles.fr: The Moon on a Rainy Night (Meian)

description.en: One rainy night, Saki is rushing to a piano lesson when she crashes into a beautiful, long-haired girl, dropping her sheet music in the process. Saki stutters an apology, but the girl simply hands back her sheet music and leaves without a word. Saki begins her first day of high school the following morning, only to find the stranger from the night before sitting at the desk next to hers. She learns that the girl’s name is Kanon and that she is not quite completely deaf, but very hard of hearing. Though Kanon needs to be close to people to read their lips, she tends to push people away with her icy demeanor. Through one kind gesture, Saki slowly begins breaking down the walls around Kanon, even as she feels something new blossoming within her. [Kodansha]
description.ko: 고등학교에 입학한 사키와 귀가 불편한 반 친구 카논. 사람들과 거리를 두는 카논이 안고 있는 것과 겉으론 보이지 않는 것. 그것을 알고자 하는 사키에게 카논도 점차···. 두 소녀의 눈에는 보이지 않는 것, 둘도 없이 소중한 것.
description.pt-br: Um dia, pouco antes de entrar no colégio, Kazuki Kaneda colide com uma garota estranha da mesma geração a caminho da aula de piano e machuca sua mão, mas a partitura que caiu silenciosamente, da outra parte é cuidadosamente recolhida e um curativo é recebido. Saki se reúne com a garota impressionante como colega de classe e descobre que seu nome é Oikawa Kanon e ela é surda. Na escola, Saki, que estava sozinha, tentou entender o som de Kanon, que manteve distância do ambiente por causa de sua deficiência, e sua atitude mudou gradualmente.

description.en:
In the year 2020, humanity faces a crisis as Earth is attacked by unidentified monsters. Players prepare for the attack by challenging the Labyrinth that appeared. They can choose four options:

Easy Mode, where anyone can survive; Normal Mode, where you must work to survive; Hard Mode, where only 1% could survive; and Solo Mode, the harshest difficulty.

Kang TaeSan, the strongest Easy Mode player cleared the Labyrinth using an unconventional approach and acquired skills others could not: [ Addition, Multiplication, Attack Nullification, Ultimate Judgement...].

But because he chose Easy Mode, his power was lacking. Unable to prevent the extinction of humanity, he lay dying. A miraculous chance appears.

"This time I'll definitely become stronger."

Challenging the Labyrinth again, this is Skill-based Player Kang TaeSan's Solo Mode Attack Record!

altTitles.ja: 異世界日本～暗殺一家の三男は異界化した日本で無双する～

altTitles.ja-ro: Isekai Nihon  - Ansatsu Ikka no Sannan wa Ikaika shita Nihon de Musou suru -

altTitles.en: Another World in Japan ~The Third Son of the Assassin Family Reigns Supreme in a Transformed Japan~

description.en: As two worlds collide into one, a fateful encounter between the "killer hero" and the "elf princess from another world" has led to a great adventure to defeat the even greater evil!
description.it: Mentre due mondi si scontrano, il fatidico incontro tra l'"eroe assassino" e la "principessa elfa di un altro mondo" porta a una grande avventura per sconfiggere un male ancora più grande!
description.pt-br: Enquanto dois mundos se mesclam em um só, um trágico conto entre o "herói assassino" e a "princesa elfo de outro mundo" leva a uma grande aventura para derrotar um mal ainda maior!

altTitles.ja: 帝乃三姉妹は案外、チョロい。

altTitles.zh-hk: 帝乃三姊妹意外的好對付。

altTitles.en: The Mikadono Sisters Are Surprisingly Easy to Deal With.

altTitles.zh: 帝乃三姐妹原来很好搞定

description.en: Though Ayase Yuu is the son of a renowned and talented actress, he is below average in anything he does. He is entrusted to live under the care of his mother's friend, and later discovers that he will also be rooming with the three sisters from his school who possess both beauty and talent. Though Yuu thought that an understanding would be impossible to reach between an ordinary person and those blessed with talent, the three sisters are surprisingly...?!
description.ja:
孤高の天才三姉妹と同居することになったちょっとポンコツめな高校生・優。平凡以下な彼が三姉妹に振り回されると思いきや…この三姉妹、案外、チョロい――？

優との生活で変わっていく三姉妹の心模様。才色兼備の三姉妹が動揺、狼狽、そしてときめく…
